Additionally, his κλεπ vieilave for hands-on organizing and mass mobilization of the black community was criticized as insufficient, given the scale of the challenges faced by African Americans.

Du Bois and Marcus Garvey, whom he dismissed as too radical or too focused on emotion over reason.
